name: Cool Disney Quiz | Movie Mixture | 20 Questions

questions.text: What colour were the Beast's eyes in 'Beauty and the Beast'?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	After the Beast was morphed back into a human, Belle recognized him by his eyes.

questions.text: What was the name that the King and Queen gave to Sleeping Beauty in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
questions.correct: Aurora & Orrora & Orora & Aurrora & Aurrorra & aurora
questions.explanation: Aurora & Orrora & Orora & Aurrora & Aurrorra & aurora.

questions.text: What was the name that the three good fairies gave to Sleeping Beauty in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
At the end of 'The Little Mermaid', how many teeth did Chef Louie have left?
What was the name of the evil cat in 'Cinderella'?
Who did the talking voice of the young Simba in 'The Lion King'?
questions.correct: Jonathan Taylor Thomas & JTT & J.T.T. & jonathan taylor thomas
questions.explanation: Jonathan Taylor Thomas & JTT & J.T.T. & jonathan taylor thomas

questions.text: Who performed the pop version of the song 'Reflections' from 'Mulan'?
Finish this song line from 'Pocahontas': 'You think you own whatever land you_______________'?
In 'Aladdin', what was the name of Jasmine's tiger?
What is the name of the sequel to 'The Little Mermaid'?
questions.explanation:
Return to the Sea.

	It is coming out on September 19th!! I'm so excited!!

questions.text: In 'Pinocchio', what is the name of the goldfish?
In 'Peter Pan', what did Mr. Darling lose at the beginning of the movie?
In 'Lady and the Tramp', what was the name of the restaurant where they shared spaghetti?
Who did the voice of Phil in 'Hercules'?
questions.correct: Danny DeVito & Danny Davito & Danny Davido & danny devito & danny davito
questions.explanation: Danny DeVito & Danny Davito & Danny Davido & danny devito & danny davito.

questions.text: Which Disney princess sings 'Someday My Prince Will Come'?
In the new movie 'Disney's The Kid', starring Bruce Willis, what is the name that the kid had chosen for the dog he was going to get when he grew up?
What is the name of the author who first wrote 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame'?
questions.correct: Victor Hugo & victor hugoe & Victor Hugoe
questions.explanation: Victor Hugo & victor hugoe & Victor Hugoe.

questions.text: Snow White's lips are as red as _________________?
What was the name of the Prince in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
Can you name one of Donald Duck's nephews?
questions.correct: Huey & Dewey & Louie & Hewey & Louis & Duey
questions.explanation: Huey & Dewey & Louie & Hewey & Louis & Duey.
